unicef-ah12.def: Percentage of adolescents ages 13−15 who smoked cigarettes or used smoked or smokeless tobacco products at any time during the last one month.
unicef-ah12.name: Risk factors
unicef-ah12.source: WHO Global Health Observatory, based on School-based surveys, other national surveys and censuses. Last update: January 2021.
